Description: Democratic Republic of Congo and Rwanda have signed a document to advance the peace process in the DRC's east, ceasefire-broker Angola said. The post DR Congo and Rwanda Advance Peace Process appeared first on The Defense Post.

Title: Sierra Nevada Corporation Completes First Flight of Rapcon-X ISR Aircraft
Description: Sierra Nevada (SNC) has completed the first flight of its new aerial intelligence, surveillance, and reconnaissance (ISR) platform, Rapcon-X. The post Sierra Nevada Corporation Completes First Flight of Rapcon-X ISR Aircraft appeared first on The Defense Post.
